website_summaries.verdict: Fans of the legendary bloodsuckers will be thrilled to receive a mansion’s worth of gothic home items, creepy fashion options, and a wealth of new ways to play "The Sims 4" that stem from being a vampire.
pros: Make a family of detailed vampire Sims
New Forgotten Hollow for vampire socialization
Vampiric lifestyles drastically affect the core game
cons: There aren’t too many new things to try out in Forgotten Hollow

customer_reviews.title: I love The Sims 4 and I'm so happy to have ...
customer_reviews.text: Downloaded within minutes. I love The Sims 4 and I'm so happy to have vampire sims too! This product absolutely works! Now, playing it I'll note that there are not too many new things in Buy/Build mode and CAS items, but I also found that this is not the focus of this pack. There are three new aspirations, new game play, and, get this, Vampire Toddlers??? Sign me up! You can WooHoo in a coffin, turn other sims into Vampires, piecing eye colors, and new vampire needs (like drinking Plasma AKA Sims blood), and you can turn into a bat. I am in LOVE with this new pack!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... is just the third party} I was a little annoyed at how they decided to word this as it ...
customer_reviews.text: {I guess other people don't realize that amazon is just the third party} I was a little annoyed at how they decided to word this as it was misleading but they did state it was a preorder and the game itself is fantastic regardless of whether it was released at 3am est on the 24th or 1pm est on the 24th. It was definitely worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: Emily grey

customer_reviews.title: This download WORKS! The only negative reviews are the ...
customer_reviews.text: This download WORKS! The only negative reviews are the ones made before the actual release time of the game. I can't wait :)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Stephens

customer_reviews.title: This Pack Sucks... But Only Plasma. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I totally love this game pack so far. It's so much fun and the vampires are a total blast to customize. The horrible thing is that, what with school obligations, I've only gotten to play two evenings of this. Even so, I've already decided it's awesome. I've been dying for The Sims 4 to add more life states for ages as they're one of my top favorite things to play with in game. Well done, EA. I just hope you guys add witches or fairies sometime soon. :)
customer_reviews.author: Tashia S

customer_reviews.title: Turn off random attacks!
customer_reviews.text: The added clothing has a great goth look, I like the new city and the new furniture. The vampire mechanics are creative and fun. I would rate this much higher if only Maxis would have included a way to turn vampire invasions off. If you aren't interested in having to deal with vampire attacks in your home, you either have to spend time researching vampires (and between work, fun, relationships, improving other skills and parenting I just don't have time for that) or use a third-party mod. That's a pain in the rear. An option to disable these attacks would be really welcome.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen T. Hamner

customer_reviews.title: By far one of the best game packs they've released so far
customer_reviews.text: By far one of the best game packs they've released so far. The vampires are so in-depth that you can make a multitude of different storylines for them. The CAS items and build/buy mode items are so versatile and beautiful, they can be used justabout anywhere. This is definitely a great game pack to add to the collection.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Elam

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Have you ever wanted a in depth vampire expansion for the Sims? This is exactly that.
customer_reviews.author: Cole R.

customer_reviews.title: A good way to add something new to the game, if you’re going to use it
customer_reviews.text: The main reason I like this game pack is because of the awesome build mode stuff. I mostly use the Sims to build houses anyways so.. I got the online game code one, you basically just put a code into origin, it works really well. If you don’t use this pack then vampires will break in and can be annoying but if you do use it then it adds a fun, supernatural twist to the game.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Harrold-Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Finally !
customer_reviews.text: Finally something supernatral its not quite the same as the sims 3 with an assortment of "go bump in the dark" creatures but its a start ! This takes the sims 3 vampires and boosts them with "life" so to speak lol it adds vampiric traits and allows your sim to grow and be molded into the vampire you dreamed it to be with a whole new set of wishes and goals to work on i hope to see more supernatral choices like this soon from the sims. This purchase was hassle free and very fast in delivery.
customer_reviews.author: ValkyrieTragedy

customer_reviews.title: ... got the code and was able to download this fun addition to my ongoing Sims 4 collection
customer_reviews.text: I got the code and was able to download this fun addition to my ongoing Sims 4 collection. Although, I was a bit taken aback by the vampire theme when I first heard this game pack was coming out, I decided the additional gameplay features were worth giving it a try. I'm glad I did, although, I must say, I need to watch out for any future vampires I play to be certain they don't stay out in the sun too long. Sadly, my first one met with an untimely death on her first camping trip. I though 6:00 p.m. was evening at the campsite. Apparently I was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Goss

customer_reviews.title: Can annoy game play
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay, but I wish there is a way to deactivate this pack in some saved games without having to use mods. I don’t like it when Vlad or other vampires break in, even when my sims do not even interact with them.
customer_reviews.author: Méa

customer_reviews.title: I think this is my favorite expansion. I like the decorations quite a bit
customer_reviews.text: I think this is my favorite expansion. I like the decorations quite a bit, I wish the more expensive decorations would be more comfortable and provide the Sims more rest. I wish there were more available lots to build on. This seems very restrictive for people who mostly like the building aspect.
customer_reviews.author: MissMaryMack

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend if you're into the supernatural
customer_reviews.text: This is my first game pack for the Sims 4! I love vampires in general, so I'm not surprised I love this pack. The gameplay of them is really fun and opens a new aspect to the game. Highly recommend if you're into the supernatural!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: Teen daughter loves and was so excited to receive finally as it had been unavailable to purchase on a PC for months.
customer_reviews.author: Collins

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t have much, I don’t even care about this one anymore after get the other ones. Has better options to pick
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

customer_reviews.title: Vampires are a fun addition to the game
customer_reviews.text: Vampires are a fun addition to the game, without the issues that they had in TS3 (why were all my neighbors vampires??) Frustrating that alien sims can not become vampires. The neighborhood that comes with the game pack is small but has a lot of character and is fun to visit. I like that vampire perks must be balanced with weaknesses.
customer_reviews.author: pretentiouskate

customer_reviews.title: vampire pack!!
customer_reviews.text: Glad I got this while it was on sale! Gotta love being a vampire in the sims world!
customer_reviews.author: Katey

customer_reviews.title: makes for a great room design
customer_reviews.text: very entertaining, creative game for young kids. we can't keep the 8 yo granddaughter (and grandma) off of it! makes for a great room design!!! teaches style and fashion and functionality of house hold items. GREAT software product.
customer_reviews.author: rgillespi

customer_reviews.title: Good Game
customer_reviews.text: Adds fun twists into your game, but the constant vampire visits get old after a while.

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining Game
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this game. The code worked perfectly and the download was effortless. She was entertained and had lots of fun making Sims.

customer_reviews.title: Interesting Game Pack
customer_reviews.text: For something that doesn’t cost too much, this pack is really interesting. EA did a really good job with this add-on!

customer_reviews.title: Love this expansion
customer_reviews.text: Love this expansion! It is amazing 😉 thank you so much amazon & Origin! Took 4 minutes to download

customer_reviews.title: Its a really great game pack with some great content
customer_reviews.text: Its a really great game pack with some great content. I got it for 50% off which was a great deal, but 20$ is still a great price for what you get.

customer_reviews.text: The best expansion pack so far in my opinion! A lot of work went into this one, its very detail oriented. Cant wait to see what comes out next!

customer_reviews.title: Vamps Oh My!
customer_reviews.text: I love when supernaturals are added to the Sims and this game pack is no disappointment. Not only do you get a bunch of cool clothing, new gothic furnishings, you also get a new neighborhood with vampires just waiting to me you. I am a long time Sims player and glad I didn't skip this one.

customer_reviews.title: It is a lot of fun and you really will enjoy it.❤️❤️❤️

customer_reviews.title: Just okay ...
customer_reviews.text: It's okay I guess. My Sim was transformed and after awhile I got tired of it so I made the cure and had her drink it. It cured the vampirism however seriously messed up her needs. I had all of the traits so I wouldn't have to eat, use the bathroom or sleep frequently. After being cured, it was as though I never got the traits at all. The stuff that came with the pack is so-so. I really wish they would concentrate on expanding some of the already existing expansion packs.

customer_reviews.title: Misinformation made me waste $20
customer_reviews.text: It says PC/MAC Online Game Code, but at the bottom it says it's ONLY for Windows. The Instant Access is for MAC. I just wasted $20 because of this awful mistake. Thanks a lot.

customer_reviews.title: Misleading and Sad
customer_reviews.text: Don't say we can play it, or even download it, when apparently you (Amazon) don't know the release time. You said we get it at 12am instead I am going to get it much later, like at noon. When I couldn't download it on Origin I had to go and have a searching spree on Sims forums to find out that you won't be able to actually download it till 10am Pacific time. Please know when something actually releases next time.

product_meta.title: The Sims 4 - Vampires [Online Game Code]
product_meta.description:
Platform:PC Online Game Code| Edition:Vampires

Transform your Sims into powerful vampires and live for eternity in an eerie new destination with The Sims 4 Vampires*. Create a variety of vampires using all-new tools and unlock unique Powers that give your Sims supernatural abilities. Escape to Forgotten Hollow, build a lair, and hang out with other immortals.

KEY FEATURES

 * Create Vampires – With all-new Create A Sim options, create vampire Sims that are alluring or frightening. Choose their fangs, add mysterious glowing eyes, even customize a unique Dark Form to transform into when enraged or spooking other Sims.
 * Unleash Supernatural Powers – Earn and wield dozens of unique Powers that give vampires the ability to control Sims’ minds and conjure spiritual energy. Balance your skills by taking on weaknesses and unlock new Powers by winning epic duels to advance your rank.
 * Escape to Forgotten Hollow – The dark, mist-covered land of Forgotten Hollow is the perfect place for vampires to socialize and let loose. Visit the abandoned mansion to discover its secrets, collect ingredients for gruesome new recipes, or move in and build your own lair.
 * Live the Immortal Life – Experience the life of a vampire and choose how to live. Will you drink from Sims or eat Plasmafruit to quench your thirst? Embrace evil and stir up trouble or blend in and start a vampire family? Whatever you choose, always avoid sunlight and garlic foods.

*REQUIRES THE SIMS 4 GAME (SOLD SEPARATELY) AND ALL GAME UPDATES TO PLAY.


PC Minimum System Requirements:PC Recommended System Requirements: * Processor: 1.8 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo, AMD Athlon 64 Dual-Core 4000+ or equivalent (For computers using built-in
 * RAM: 2 GB RAM
 * Hard Disk: At least 3 GB of free space (14 GB if installing with The Sims 4) with at least 1 GB additional spac
 * Video Card: 128 MB of Video RAM and support for Pixel Shader 3.0. Supported Video Cards: NVIDIA GeForce 6600 or better, ATI Radeon X1300 or better, Intel GMA X4500 or better
 * Supported OS: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7

 * Processor: Intel core i5 or faster, AMD Athlon X4
 * RAM: 4 GB RAM
 * Hard Disk: 15 GB of Hard Drive space
 * Video Card: NVIDIA GTX 650 or better

Mac Minimum System Requirements:Mac Recommended System Requirements: * Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo (Dual-Core)
 * RAM: 4 GB RAM
 * Hard Disk: 2 GB
 * Video Card: ATI Radeon HD 3870 / NVidia Geforce 8800 / Intel HD 3000
 * Supported OS: Mac Yosemite 10.10, Mac Mavericks 10.9, Mac Mountain Lion 10.8
 * Additional Requirements: This game is not supported on volumes formatted as Mac OS Extended (Case Sensitive)
   The following video chipsets are unsupported for SimCity4 Deluxe: ATI RADEON HD 2400, 2600, NVIDIA 8600m, Intel Integrated GMA 950, Intel Integrated x3100

 * Processor: 2.2GHz Intel Quad Core or better
 * RAM: 4 GB RAM
 * Video Card: ATI Radeon HD 5750 / NVidia Geforce 650M (512MB)
feature_bullets: REQUIRES THE SIMS 4 GAME (SOLD SEPARATELY) AND ALL GAME UPDATES TO PLAY
